Key Arguments: The bill is seen as an attempt by the government to exert more control and silence dissent.
It is perceived as a threat to free speech and an encroachment on freedom and human rights.
The submission expresses a belief that the government is advancing systemic corruption and lies.
Notable Quotes: This bill is just another example of attempts by an increasingly totalitarian government to exert more control and silence both truth and dissent.
I wholeheartedly reject this bill and any attempt to silence the truth and further advance the systemic corruption and lies which pervade this countries government, institutions and media.
